name: Calra
appearance: Amber skin, neat curls pinned with silver seals, a tailored indigo coat with seven waxed satchels at the belt and a perpetual, inviting smile.
character: Affable in salons and relentless in ledgers; believes prosperity is a tide best managed by those with steady hands—hers, chiefly.
talents: Turns enemies into clients with soft loans
dreams: Privatize sections of the river wall
Forge a binding pact with Seven-Kettle for iron and coal
secrets: Holds a sea-night prism that nullifies simple wards
Inserted an illegal star-metal clause in a dwarven draft
Used a white-book pardon to erase a cousin’s debt-murder
